content.question: Attribute the painting to the artist who painted it. Justify your attribution by discussing specific characteristics of the painting that are commonly associated with the work of that artist.

frqParts.text: Attribute the painting to the artist who painted it. Justify your attribution by discussing specific characteristics of the painting that are commonly associated with the work of that artist.

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
